synopsis.p: Writes the corpus in the infamous Alvis Enriched Document Format suitable for indexation with Zebra-Alvis.

description.p: Writes the corpus in the infamous Alvis Enriched Document Format suitable for indexation with Zebra-Alvis.

param-doc.name: tokenTypeFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature in token annotations containing the token type.

param-doc.name: active
param-doc.p: This expression is evaluated as a boolean with the corpus as the context element, the module will process the document only if the result is true.

param-doc.name: outFilePrefix
param-doc.p: Prefix of the name of generated files.

param-doc.name: neTypeFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature in named entity annotations containing the named entity type.

param-doc.name: sentenceLayerName
param-doc.p: Name of the layer containing sentence annotations.

param-doc.name: termCanonicalFormFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature containing the term canonical form.

param-doc.name: urlPrefix
param-doc.p: Prefix for the document URL.

param-doc.name: urlSuffixFeature
param-doc.p: Document feature to use as the URL suffix.

param-doc.name: neLayerName
param-doc.p: Name of the layer containing named entity annotations.

param-doc.name: neCanonicalFormFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature in named entity annotations containing the canonical form.

param-doc.name: metaTrans
param-doc.p: Metadata key translation.

param-doc.name: wordLayerName
param-doc.p: Name of the layer containing word annotations.

param-doc.name: lemmaFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature in word annotations containing the lemma.

param-doc.name: documentFilter
param-doc.p: Only process document that satisfy this filter.

param-doc.name: termLayerName
param-doc.p: Name of the layer containing the term annotations.

param-doc.name: sectionFilter
param-doc.p: Process only sections that satisfy this filter.

param-doc.name: semanticFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature containing semantic features of named entities and terms.

param-doc.name: outFileSuffix
param-doc.p: Suffix of the name of generated files.

param-doc.name: blockStart
param-doc.p: Start point for document block numbering.

param-doc.name: blockSize
param-doc.p: Number of documents in each document block.

param-doc.name: outDir
param-doc.p: Path to the directory where to write files.

param-doc.name: idMetaFeature
param-doc.p: Metadata key for the document id.

param-doc.name: posFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature in word annotations containing the POS tag.

param-doc.name: tokenLayerName
param-doc.p: Name of the layer containing token annotations.

param-doc.name: userFunctions
param-doc.p: Set user functions available for this module. If this module is a sequence, then all compounds inherit its functions.
